---
id: query-group-info
title: "Query group info"
description: "By calling this API, you can query group information, including group name, group notice, group avatar, group mute information, group specification limits, group creation time, and group attributes."
api: 
info_path: core_products/zim/en/docs_zim_server/Group/open-api-desc
---

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Query group info</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/"}></MethodEndpoint>


By calling this API, you can query group information, including group name, group notice, group avatar, group mute information, group specification limits, group creation time, and group attributes.

<Note title="QPS Limit"> 20 times/s</Note>

## Request

URL.","example":"https://xxx.com/xxx.png"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"IsAllForbid"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether all members are muted.\n- true: Yes.\n- false: No.\n>**Note**\n>\n> IsAllForbid and ForbidList will not exist at the same time.\n","example":true}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"ForbidList"} required={false} schemaName={"number[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"array","items":{"type":"number"},"description":"Muted group roles.\n- 1: Group owner.\n- 2: Group administrator.\n- 3: Group member.\n- Other values: Your custom group roles, generally recommended to be greater than 100.\n","example":[2,3]}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>LimitInfo</strong><span collapsible={false} name={"MemberCountLimit"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"number","description":"Group member count limit.","example":100}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"JoinMode"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"number","description":"Join mode:\n- 0: No verification required, anyone can join the group directly.\n- 1: Users need to initiate a join request, and can only join the group after approval by the group owner or group administrator.\n- 2: External users can only join the group through invitation by group members.\n","example":1}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"InviteMode"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"number","description":"Invite mode:\n- 0: All group members can invite external users to join the group.\n- 1: Only the group owner or group administrator can initiate invitations.\n","example":1}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"BeInvitedMode"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"number","description":"Be invited mode:\n- 0: External users can be directly invited to join the group without their consent.\n- 1: After inviting someone to join the group, their consent is required.\n","example":1}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"NumberMessage"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"number","description":"Number of historical messages that new members can retrieve after joining the group.","example":100}}></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"ForbidExpireTime"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"number","description":"Unix timestamp when the mute ends, in milliseconds (ms).","example":1000}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"GroupCreateTime"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={undefined}
